channel.title: [PI] need help enabling trade for only one owner
channel.description:
i know how to disable trading for any staff but if i disable tradin for owners how would i make it that i can still trade ? i think its using the ignore.case thing but not sure how to put it in.
and if some one could help me with disabling drops for admins and owners cuz i have it set to disable drops for admins and they can still drop in config.java
